room_title: Escape room "Escape the Clown Mausoleum" by Outatime Games in Chicago
room_description: The HAPPI Mausoleum seal has been broken for the last time. MARLEY J HAPPI, the last of the famous HAPPI clown family, has just passed away last week. Your uncle, a fellow clown rival of the HAPPI family happened to be there to hear MARLEY’S drug-induced death bed confession.  MARLEY will finally be buried in the HAPPI family mausoleum along with the family’s stash of jewels. To top it off, you found out by today’s local newspaper announcement, that this mausoleum will be sealed at dawn in 60 minutes. Can you break in and find those riches, or will it be lost forever?
